main event: A bright amber fireball with a vertical tail was observed descending slowly and vertically until disappearing behind an island in the Caribbean.
interesting points: The fireball was observed for 10-15 seconds while the observer was anchored off Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos Island.
The entire horizon was brightly illuminated by the fireball.
The report classifies the observation as a 'Ground-Visual' and 'Air-Visual' type.
The report states that there is insufficient data to evaluate the nature of the object.
The location coordinates for Cockburn Harbour were provided in a follow-up message.
sighted object: bright amber fireball with vertical tail
location: Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos Island, Caribbean
